title: RNN vs. CNN vs. Autoencoder vs. Attention/Transformer
excerpt: A practical guide to various deep learning architectures, including Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Autoencoders, and Attention/Transformer models, with examples and use cases.

title: AI Engineering: RAG and Agents
excerpt: Detailed exploration of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and AI agents, covering definitions, workflows, tools, planning, control flows, and memory management in AI applications.

title: AI Engineering: Prompt Engineering
excerpt: An in-depth look at prompt engineering, discussing its importance in guiding AI models, the anatomy of a prompt, and strategies for effective prompt design.

title: RecMind: Large Language Model Powered Agent for Recommendation
excerpt: A summary of the RecMind paper, discussing the use of large language models as agents for recommendation systems, including architecture, advantages, challenges, and implementation patterns.
